stories.body_es: Kidilum representa una incursi√≥n significativa en la escena culinaria de Manhattan, trayendo consigo la riqueza de los sabores de la costa de Malabar en Kerala, India. Although Indian cuisine is relatively well-known in Manhattan, the specific focus on Malabar gastronomy offers a unique and refined perspective.
